Class Clock

  • java.lang.Object
    • cis175.clockproject.Clock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clock_Interface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DigitalClock, MechanicalClock, NaturalClock, QuantumClock

    public abstract class Clock
extends java.lang.Object
implements Clock_Interface
    abstract class - root class of all other simulated clock classes.

    1.0 CIS175 Spring 2019
    Author:
    Daniel Williams, Matthew Ambrose
